name: Thunder Summoner's Crown
title: Lightning and Rain: Thunder Summoner's Crown
desc: "The song pierced the storm's low hum, ripped through the clouds, and bestowed upon it, light."
in_play_description: When you play a Talent card or a Character uses a Skill: Spend 1 less Electro Die. (Once per Round)

skills.desc: When you play a Talent card or a Character uses a Skill: Spend 1 less Electro Die. (Once per Round) (A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
